```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,eval = TRUE)
```

This is a collection of plots I find myself making often. 


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data(cars)
cars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(speed,dist)) +
  geom_point()
```
